summary: 2013 NISSAN ALTIMA.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO VEHICLE ACCIDENT AND TRANSMISSION RECALL ISSUES.  *LD    THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT BEFORE RECEIVING A RECALL NOTICE FOR THE TRANSMISSION (35-00F4-72D). THE CONSUMER INQUIRED IF THE RECALL FAILURE WAS RELATED TO THE CAUSE OF THE ACCIDENT. UPDATED 08/28/2017*JS
